DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to identify reasons migraine patients stop using triptan medications for abortive headache treatment. It is hypothesized that inadequate education of the patient at the time of prescribing the triptan is positively associated with triptan discontinuation.
DOC.brief_title: Identifying Factors Underlying the Discontinuation of Triptans
DOC.criteria: Triptan User Episodic Migraine or Chronic Migraine Have used a triptan medication in the prior 3 months Have used triptan medications for at least 1 year Triptan Discontinuation Episodic Migraine or Chronic Migraine Used any triptan medication in the last 2 years Have not used a triptan medication in the last 6 months
